remarks: Distributive law for scalar product operation, using operations from the dual space.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2014.)
statement:
ldualvsdi1.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvsdi1.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
ldualvsdi1.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
ldualvsdi1.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvsdi1.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
ldualvsdi1.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
ldualvsdi1.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualvsdi1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. K ) $.
ldualvsdi1.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvsdi1.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
ldualvsdi1 $p |- ( ph -> ( X .x. ( G .+ H ) ) = ( ( X .x. G ) .+ ( X .x. H ) ) ) $.
